indicatorTitle: Mean rainfall value in the region
indicatorDescription: Mean rainfall value in the region

Mean Normalised Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) value for the region
Percentage area of the region detected as inundated

Intensity is calculated by dividing number of times a pixel got inundated with the maximum number of times any pixel got inundated in the region. For instance, if a pixel A in region got inundated 5 times in a month and the pixel with maximum inundation saw 10 days of inundation. Then inundation intensity of pixel A is 5/10 = 0.5. This variable then calculates mean of inundation intensities of all pixels.

indicatorTitle: Mean intensity of inundation (removing 0 intensity pixels)
indicatorDescription: Mean of inundation intensities of all pixels which were inundated atleast once in the month
Sum of inundation intensities of all pixels in the region

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood tenders granted under SOPD Scheme
indicatorDescription: SOPD Scheme is the State Owned Priority Development Scheme. This variable gives information of total value of tenders that were granted under SOPD Scheme

indicatorTitle: Total Value of Flood Tenders Under SDRF
indicatorDescription: This variable gives information of total value of tenders that were granted under State Disaster Response Fund

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood tenders granted under RIDF Scheme
indicatorDescription: RIDF is the Rural Infrastructure Development Fund maintained by NABARD. This variable gives information of total value of tenders that were granted under RIDF.

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood tenders granted under CIDF Scheme
indicatorDescription: CIDF City Infra Development Fund is maintained by Assam Government for urban development. This variable gives information of total value of tenders that were granted under CIDF

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood tenders granted under Long-term irrigation fund
Total Value of Flood Tenders for Repairs and Restoration
indicatorDescription: This variable gives sum of all tenders that are flagged as Restoration Measures

indicatorTitle: Total Value of Flood Tenders for Immediate Measures
indicatorDescription: This variable gives sum of all tenders that are flagged as Immediate Measures

indicatorTitle: Total value of flood tenders related to Others
indicatorDescription: Every flood related tender is flagged as either "Preparedness", "Immediate Measure" or "Other" based on key words. This column gives sum of all tenders that are flagged as Other
